function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak governance of urban green spaces","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of Latin American societies during the COVID-19 pandemic and future societal crises","Mitigation":"Improving governance of urban green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning and management tools, digital platforms for collaborative governance, community engagement strategies","People":"Low-income population, residents of Latin American cities","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of collaboration and networks among mid-size city public service managers","Impact":"Under-staffed and under-funded management of urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Building collaborative networks, providing training and resources for public service managers","Technologies":"Digital networking platforms, capacity-building programs, knowledge sharing tools","People":"Mid-level staff, public service managers","Owner":"Municipal governments, inter-agency offices"},{"Description":"Maladaptation in the usage of urban green spaces","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of Latin American societies during the COVID-19 pandemic and future societal crises","Mitigation":"Improving adaptation strategies, promoting equitable access to green spaces, enhancing public health awareness","Technologies":"GIS mapping, community engagement platforms, public health monitoring tools","People":"Population in Latin American cities, especially low-income residents","Owner":"Urban planners, public health authorities, community organizations"}]}
